title: Columbia Scolds Students for "Unsanctioned" Gaza Rally Where They Were Attacked With Chemicals
description:
Two people reportedly sprayed an odious chemical at protesters, leaving students with burning eyes, nausea, and chest pain.

The post Columbia Scolds Students for “Unsanctioned” Gaza Rally Where They Were Attacked With Chemicals appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Georgia GOP Proposes RICO Expansion for “Loitering” Protesters
description:
In a bid to repress movements like Stop Cop City, the far right wants enhanced penalties based on “political affiliation or belief.”

The post Georgia GOP Proposes RICO Expansion for “Loitering” Protesters appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Don’t Fall for the Third-Party Trick
description:
A progressive who stays home on Election Day — or backs Robert F. Kennedy Jr., Cornel West, or No Labels — is voting for Donald Trump.

The post Don’t Fall for the Third-Party Trick appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Pensions for the “Deep State”: Republicans Push Benefits for Air America, the CIA’s Secret Vietnam-Era Airline
description:
Sen. Marco Rubio and Rep. Glenn Grothman want to recognize the contribution of Air America, the CIA airline that supported secret wars in Laos and Cambodia.

The post Pensions for the “Deep State”: Republicans Push Benefits for Air America, the CIA’s Secret Vietnam-Era Airline appeared first on The Intercept.
